member_organisations: Though we operate on a LGBT+ community level, Plus is not officially member of bigger organisations.
fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Public Health
eu_initiatives: In 2017 we applied for the Civil Society Forum on Hiv and Hepatitis.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication:
We supported the ESTICOM project by helping collect data for the 2017 edition of EMIS (European MSM Internet Survey) and the first research on Community Health Workers. 
 
Our vice-president is member of EATG (European Aids Treatment Group) and chair of ECAB.
